name: Trial Balance (Simple)
query:
select fiscal_year as "Fiscal Year:Data:80",
	company as "Company:Data:220",
	posting_date as "Posting Date:Date:100",
	account as "Account:Data:380",
	sum(debit) as "Debit:Currency:140",
	sum(credit) as "Credit:Currency:140",
	finance_book as "Finance Book:Link/Finance Book:140"
from `tabGL Entry`
where is_cancelled = 0 and company = %(company)s
group by fiscal_year, company, posting_date, account
order by fiscal_year, company, posting_date, account
